Test Dynamic Domain Tree
open${base_url}/foo_module/FooModule_createObjects
assertTextPresentCreated Successfully.
open${base_url}/foo_module/ListBoxZuite_waitForActivities
assertTextPresentDone.
open${base_url}/foo_module/FooModule_viewFooList/listbox/ListBox_setPropertyList?field_domain_tree=checked;field_domain_root_list=parent_domain%7CParent
assertTextPresentSet Successfully.
open${base_url}/foo_module/view
assertElementNotPresentdomain_root_url
clickAndWaitid=listbox_domain_tree_mode
verifySelecteddomain_root_urlParent
verifyText//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[1]//a+ Title 0
verifyText//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[2]//a+ Title 1
verifyTextid=listbox_record_number10 record(s)
verifyText//tr[@id="listbox_data_line_0"]/td[2]0
verifyText//tr[@id="listbox_data_line_1"]/td[2]1
verifyText//tr[@id="listbox_data_line_2"]/td[2]2
clickAndWaitlink=+ Title 0
verifySelecteddomain_root_urlParent
verifyText//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[1]//a- Title 0
verifyText//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[2]//a+ Title 1
verifyText//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[3]//a+ Title 2
verifyText//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[4]//a+ Title 3
verifyTextid=listbox_record_number1 record(s)
verifyText//tr[@id="listbox_data_line_0"]/td[2]0
open${base_url}/foo_module/FooModule_viewFooList/FooModule_deleteObjectList
assertTextPresentDeleted Successfully.
open${base_url}/foo_module/view
verifyText//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[1]//a+ Title 1
verifyText//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[2]//a+ Title 2
verifyTextid=listbox_record_number9 record(s)
verifyText//tr[@id="listbox_data_line_0"]/td[2]1
verifyText//tr[@id="listbox_data_line_1"]/td[2]2
\n \n \n
